title: SCP-7908

[[module CSS]]
@import url("https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/misans@4.0.0/lib/Normal/MiSans-Regular.min.css");
@import url("https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/misans@4.0.0/lib/Normal/MiSans-Bold.min.css");
@import url("https://cdn.scpwiki.com/theme/en/sigma/css/sigma.min.css");
@font-face {    
    font-family: "Punctuation";    
    src: url('https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/WinterholdPrime/CDN@main/GlowSansSCBook_3500.woff2') format('woff2');
    font-weight: normal;
    font-style: normal;
    font-display: swap;
    unicode-range: U+2018-2019, U+201C-201D, U+2014, U+2026, U+00B7, U+FF1A-FF1B, U+FF01, U+FF0C, U+FF1F, U+3002;     
}
@font-face {    
    font-family: "Punctuation";    
    src: url('https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/WinterholdPrime/CDN@main/GlowSansSCBold_3500.woff2') format('woff2');
    font-weight: bold;
    font-style: normal;
    font-display: swap;
    unicode-range: U+2018-2019, U+201C-201D, U+2014, U+2026, U+00B7, U+FF1A-FF1B, U+FF01, U+FF0C, U+FF1F, U+3002;     
}
@font-face {
    font-family: 'GlowSansSC';
    src: url('https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/WinterholdPrime/CDN@main/GlowSansSCHeavy_3500.woff2') format('woff2');
    font-weight: 900;
    font-style: normal;
    font-display: swap;
    size-adjust: 75%;
}
body {
    font-family: 'Punctuation', Inter,RedactRect,BlinkMacSystemFont,'Segoe UI',Roboto,Oxygen,Ubuntu,Cantarell,'Fira Sans','Droid Sans','Helvetica Neue','MiSans', sans-serif;
}
.qd {
    -webkit-text-emphasis-style: filled dot; 
    text-emphasis-position: under right;
}
.u2 {
  border-bottom: 1.5px solid;
}
#header h1 a span {
    font-family: 'Sans Normalcy', 'GlowSansSC', Arial, sans-serif;
}
#top-bar ul li a {
    max-height: none;
}
[[/module]]
